title: A sermon preached before the judges, &c. in the time of the assizes in the Cathedral church at Gloucester on Sunday Aug. 7, 1681 published to put a stop to false and injurious representations / by Edward Fowler.
author: Fowler, Edward, 1632-1714.
publisher: Printed for R. Royston, and Walter Kettilby,
notes: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
